name: objectify
description: Serialise and deserialise JavaScript objects in TypeScript.

scripts.build:
rm -rf dist && perl -pi -e 's/
|
|/
/g' $(find ../.. -name "cli.js" | grep "node_modules/uglifyjs-folder") && tsc && uglifyjs-folder dist -e -x .js -o dist

author: James Garner <j@jada.io> (http://jada.io/)
